TopicTitle: Texture with Bumped Specular shader not showing up

Articles.Content:
See screenshots below:

The objects in the model of the part that use bumped specular shader don't show up when the part is taken off the vessel in Editor. In the part icon, the texture shows up, but the normal map for it doesn't.

I'm guessing I have to add a tag to these objects, but which one?

Thanks.
